UTiling: Controls how much the texture tiles horizontally, by scaling the U component of the vertex UVs by the specified amount.
VTiling: Controls how much the texture tiles vertically, by scaling the V component of the vertex UVs by the specified amount.
UnMirrorU:
Would like to unmirror U or V
- if the texture is mirrored and if you would like to undo mirroring for this texture sample, use this to unmirror
